plot: A day in the life of a man whose mind is on the edge of stability. Haunted by visions and sounds from another dimension, he tries to find help to deal with his curse.
title: Ire
plot_es: A day in the life of a man whose mind is on the edge of stability. Haunted by visions and sounds from another dimension, he tries to find help to deal with his curse.
